mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Barclay, Ted, 1844-1915
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Reports hard march from Martinsburg to Luray; speculates destination is Culpeper Court House. Begs sister to send clothing; reports his is ragged and louse-infested.
There are three files available: a PDF transcription, a plain text transcription, and a PDF which was created from scans of the original document.
